body.name: WiFi Projector for iPhone, ELEPHAS 2024 Upgraded Mini Projector with Tripod & Carry Bag, Full HD 1080P Supported, 200" Display Portable Projector, Compatible with iOS/Android/Windows/TV Stick/HDMI/USB
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 12 mins
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 18 hrs 12 mins
features: 【Wireless Connection, More Convenient】This movie projector uses the latest Synchronize Screen technology, whether with wifi or without wifi, using your iOS/Android/Windows smartphone link on the projector, you can enjoy no lagging same screen effect, great for watching movies and games, etc.

【1080P Full HD Supported, Enjoy Movie Theater Quality】 The small projector supports 1080P full HD resolution. It has a maximum projection distance of up to 16.4 feet, a 200-inch screen, and a contrast ratio of 10000:1, as well as the latest German-developed high-precision lens so that you can actually feel the 3D technology-like film and television effects. The built-in stereo surround speaker restored every detail sound effect to let you enjoy the pleasure sounds in different scenes.

【Small Size, Carry it Anywhere】The latest ELEPHAS 2024 projector, with its ultra-compact design, allows you to take it with a hand, definitely a hand-size mini projector！ Comes with a stand and carry bag, so it is very convenient to carry the 1080p projector outdoors. The outdoor projector supports multiple projection methods of front projection and rear projection. In addition to desktop projection, ceiling projection is also available (an additional purchase of 1/4 nuts is required).

【Wide Compatible, Enjoy More Joy】This movie projector outside is equipped with multiple ports, such as USB/HDMI/AV/Audio/Chromecast interface, which can be easily connected to a variety of media devices, compatible with Laptop, PCs, TV Box, TV Stick, Chrome Book, Tablets, Blue-ray DVD player, USB Flash Drive, Media players, Smartphones.( Note: Due to HDCP copyright, this mini projector doesn't support Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu, but you could use Amazon Fire Stick or Roku Stick.)

【Three-Year Warranty & High-quality Service】ELEPHAS always adheres to the customer-first service philosophy. If you have any questions or problems when using our products, please feel free to contact us directly on Amazon. We offer a quick reply within 24 hours, a three-year product replacement warranty, and a lifetime after-sales service.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 2,610 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What's in the box 1 x Projector 1 x Carry bag 1 x Tripod 1 x Remote Control 1 x Lens Cover 1 x Power Cord 1 x HDMI Cable 1 x Video Cable 1 x User Manual 1 x Quick Start Guide

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exceeds any expectation, easy set up and simple to operate. Image quality is excellent and fast, never pixilated. Running it off a laptop and projecting on Kodak screen. Totally satisfied with the set up. Beats the cost of buying a flat screen TV, plus can move the gear around for other use of space. Planning to buy several for gifts this year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used it to help with typing papers I could connect to it via Bluetooth and type on a screen as large as I wanted. It has lots of features like the ability to hook up to a computer or by Bluetooth. The image was pretty clear and even the built in speaker sounded pretty good for the money. Overall this projector worked great for me. I can tell you that this probably wouldn’t be the projector for your home entertainment/movie room. But for everything else it is a great little unit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I had an older model before & it lasted me a good 3 years but then it was time to get a new one. I stummed upon this one & thought i'd give it a try. Honestly love this one a lot better! Quality is great for the price, clear picture quality, volume is also good (depending on the application you are using,) & it is very easy to use for anyone. I use my firestick with it to watch tv & I love it! Overall I give it an 8.5/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good little projector
reviews.reviewText: We gifted this to our son for Christmas. I was pleased to get a really good Black Friday Deal. I haven't used projectors a lot before so I can't compare this with others but I did read the reviews for this so I can address some things. First, it was a bit of a pain to setup. The instructions that come with it are not very helpful. As far as I was able to tell in our trial and error setup, you WILL need something to assist with casting from your phone. We pulled a basic Google Chromecast off one of our TVs and all of a sudden it was working great. I think these are under $30 so it's worth the investment. I'm not familiar with Apple so sorry I can't address that. We just plugged in the HDMI cable to the projector and also the USB cable (both came with the Chromecast) into the projector to power the Chromecast. Fantastic. Then, for the audio. As far as I could tell you CANNOT do Bluetooth audio with this. You have to have an aux to aux cable (old school headphone jack on both ends), plug into your projector and into your speaker (make sure if you buy a speaker to go with this that it does have a plugin for an aux cord not just bluetooth capability--I ordered a basic bluetooth speaker for him and I was lucky, it did have a plugin). Once we got that figured out it was working great. Only concern now--the tripod that comes with this is not great. It's not very secure, doesn't hold the projector securely in all positions. My son wanted to cast onto the ceiling and he had to just cobble together a setup because the tripod wouldn't work for that without the picture being crooked. Even casting onto a wall it took a lot of fiddling with the tripod for it to even maintain a basic stability and then just don't bump it whatever you do!! All in all, we're happy with this now that we have it setup. The picture and sound (even the sound of the projector without the speaker is pretty good for its size!) are good, and we wanted a small projector so it would be portable, so we definitely got that. Pretty happy with it, just save yourself grief and have the Chromecast or whatever casting device and the aux cord ready to go!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We are very pleased with the mini projector. This was a gif for our granddaughter. She couldn’t be happier. It’s headed off to college wit her. It has a great picture and is very easy to set up. We purchased a second one for another granddaughter and she too was very excited and pleased! We would definately recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This projector was awesome! Its picture was magnificent. The sound quality was mediocre but if you hook it up with a wireless speaker then it is still great. My granddaughter loved this as a present for Christmas and she used it all day and it didn’t heat up very much at all so that’s good. 10 out of 10 recommend👍 ( The photo is a little blurry but my hand was just shaking )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: At work I have had an Epson Powerlite 5 for about 10 years that I use for training at mobile sites that has a great picture. The Elephas I just purchased has a great picture as well but smaller, lighter, speaker built in and more connectivity options. This one I purchased for home use and have only had it for a few days but love the picture and versatility as well as price. The speaker has really good volume but does sound a little boxy in certain settings. It will do the job being so mobile and eliminating having to pack an external speaker. If this projector lasts as long as the Epson, its definitely worth the price. I plan on using this for family outdoor movies possibly with a sound bar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great with fire stick, not with airplay or screen mirroring
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this for my daughter's room so that she can watch a show or movie from her phone, and she doesn't have room for a tv. It would screen mirror from her iPhone, but it wouldn't screen mirror any kind of streaming device unfortunately. But, once I added an amazon fire stick it worked great.I love the size, and the tripod that comes with it to help angle the screen. It focuses easily and was easy to set up.Overall I recommend, I just wouldn't expect it to screen mirror streaming from your phone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Funciona bien pero no se ve muy nitido
reviews.reviewText: Funciona bien pero no se ve muy nitido
